posts.content: >Kiran Patel, a 49-year-old Gujarati immigrant, was brutally killed during a robbery at her store in Union County, South Carolina. Surveillance cameras captured the chilling moments as a masked gunman stormed into DD’s Food Mart, demanded money, and fired shots when Patel resisted. She tried to escape but was chased into the parking lot, collapsing just 20 feet away after being shot multiple times. Locals describe Patel as a hardworking woman who ran her store for years and was loved in the community.>Living in the US for 23 years>Shot 8 times>Gunman left after shooting her and leaving her for dead in the gas station lot>Gunman later returned and executed Patel>Kiran Ben’s son lives in the UK, and her daughter lives in Canada. The woman had been running a store in the USA for 23 years. Her family in Siswa village, Borsad, is deeply saddened by her death and has expressed anger over the increasing ethnic attacks on people of Indian origin.>Other relatives in Australia and New Zealand.>A suspect has been apprehended>Zadean Mack Hill - Age 21This is what your racism is causing. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dh1JLCUpC3I
